title: Elon Musk says AI will take every job and humans will be free to grow vegetables
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has claimed that Artificial Intelligence (AI) and robots will take over all jobs in the future. However, he insists that humans won’t actually need to work and can grow vegetables if they wish to.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming our society. AI can do a lot of tasks that previously depended on human input. This has led to fears that AI may soon replace humans in the workplace. This fear is not unjustified, with major companies suc... [2201 chars]

title: Breaching AI policy may see lawyers fired: Singapore law firms
description: Law firms here are treating breaches of generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) policies as potentially sackable offences, following a landmark High Court case that ordered a lawyer to personally pay $800 in costs for citing a hallucinated case, that is, one generated by AI and which does not actually exist.

title: WhatsApp now warns you before sharing screen with strangers during video call, why it is a big deal
description: Meta introduces new artificial intelligence-driven tools to help users avoid cyber scams on WhatsApp, Messenger, and Facebook.

title: AI algorithm proves more accurate than experts in glaucoma detection
description: While artificial intelligence (AI)-powered screening has been validated for diabetic retinopathy, applying the technology to glaucoma has proved more challenging because glaucoma is not one disease. A glaucoma diagnosis is based on a constellation of symptoms, diagnostic tests, and longitudinal data.
